dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S476 IS: To amend the Chesapeake and Ohio Canal Development Act to extend to the Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park Commission.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Cardin (for himself and Ms. Mikulski) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Chesapeake and Ohio Canal Development Act to extend to the Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park Commission.

section.header: Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park Commission
section.text: Section 6(g) of the Chesapeake and Ohio Canal Development Act (16 U.S.C. 410yâ€“4(g)) is amended by striking 40 and inserting 50.
